body:
Select * From dbo.Db_Version DV
Select * From dbo.Db_SchemaSnapshots DSS
Select * From dbo.Db_Migrations DM
Select * From dbo.Db_MigrationErrors DME



--Delete dbo.Db_Migrations Where Version = '1.0.1'
--Delete dbo.Db_SchemaSnapshots Where Version = '1.0.1'
--Delete dbo.Db_Version Where Version = '1.0.1'
--Delete dbo.Db_MigrationErrors Where Version = '1.0.1'
--Drop Table dbo.Db_Migrations
--Drop Table dbo.Db_SchemaSnapshots
--Drop Table dbo.Db_Version
--Drop Table dbo.Db_MigrationErrors
